verses.verse: Can you draw <S%H4900>out<s%> <S%H3882>Leviathan<s%> with a <S%H8257>fishhook,<s%> or press down his <S%H3956>tongue<s%> with a <S%H2256>cord?<s%>
Can you <S%H7760>put<s%> a <S%H100>rope<s%> into his <S%H639>nose,<s%> or <S%H5344>pierce<s%> his <S%H3895>jaw<s%> through with a <S%H2336>hook?<s%>
Will he make <S%H7235>many<s%> <S%H8469>petitions<s%> to <S%H1696>you,<s%> or will he speak soft words to <S%H7390>you?<s%>
Will he <S%H3772>make<s%> a <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with <S%H3947>you,<s%> that you should take him for a <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H5769>forever?<s%>
Will you <S%H7832>play<s%> with him as with a <S%H6833>bird?<s%> Or will you <S%H7194>bind<s%> him for your <S%H5291>girls?<s%>
Will <S%H2271>traders<s%> <S%H3739>barter<s%> for <S%H2673>him?<s%> Will they part him among the <S%H3669>merchants?<s%>
Can you <S%H4390>fill<s%> his <S%H5785>skin<s%> with barbed <S%H7905>irons,<s%> or his <S%H7218>head<s%> with <S%H1709>fish<s%> <S%H6767>spears?<s%>
<S%H7760>Lay<s%> your <S%H3709>hand<s%> on <S%H2142>him.<s%> Remember the <S%H4421>battle,<s%> and do so no <S%H3254>more.<s%>
<S%H8431>Behold,<s%> the hope of him is in <S%H3576>vain.<s%> <S%H2904>Won't<s%> one be cast down even at the sight of <S%H4758>him?<s%>
None is so <S%H393>fierce<s%> that he dare stir him <S%H5782>up.<s%> Who then is he who can <S%H3320>stand<s%> before <S%H6440>me?<s%>
Who has first <S%H6923>given<s%> to <S%H7999>me,<s%> that I should repay <S%H8064>him?<s%> Everything under the heavens is mine.
"I will not keep silence <S%H2790>concerning<s%> his <S%H907>limbs,<s%> nor his mighty <S%H1369>strength,<s%> nor his <S%H2433>goodly<s%> <S%H6187>frame.<s%>
Who can <S%H1540>strip<s%> off his <S%H6440>outer<s%> <S%H3830>garment?<s%> Who shall <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H3718>within<s%> his <S%H7448>jaws?<s%>
Who can <S%H6605>open<s%> the <S%H1817>doors<s%> of his <S%H6440>face?<s%> <S%H5439>Around<s%> his <S%H8127>teeth<s%> is <S%H367>terror.<s%>
Strong <S%H4043>scales<s%> are his <S%H1346>pride,<s%> shut up <S%H5462>together<s%> with a <S%H6862>close<s%> <S%H2368>seal.<s%>
<S%H259>One<s%> is so <S%H5066>near<s%> to <S%H259>another,<s%> that no <S%H7307>air<s%> can come between <S%H935>them.<s%>
They are <S%H1692>joined<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> to <S%H251>another.<s%> They stick <S%H3920>together,<s%> so that they <S%H6504>can't<s%> be pulled apart.
His <S%H5846>sneezing<s%> <S%H1984>flashes<s%> out <S%H216>light.<s%> His <S%H5869>eyes<s%> are like the <S%H6079>eyelids<s%> of the <S%H7837>morning.<s%>
Out of his <S%H6310>mouth<s%> <S%H1980>go<s%> burning <S%H3940>torches.<s%> <S%H3590>Sparks<s%> of <S%H784>fire<s%> leap <S%H4422>forth.<s%>
Out of his <S%H5156>nostrils<s%> a <S%H6227>smoke<s%> <S%H3318>goes,<s%> as of a <S%H5301>boiling<s%> <S%H1731>pot<s%> over a fire of <S%H100>reeds.<s%>
His <S%H5315>breath<s%> <S%H3857>kindles<s%> <S%H1513>coals.<s%> A <S%H3851>flame<s%> goes <S%H3318>forth<s%> from his <S%H6310>mouth.<s%>
There is <S%H5797>strength<s%> <S%H3885>in<s%> his <S%H6677>neck.<s%> <S%H1670>Terror<s%> <S%H1750>dances<s%> before <S%H6440>him.<s%>
The <S%H4651>flakes<s%> of his <S%H1320>flesh<s%> are joined <S%H1692>together.<s%> They are <S%H3332>firm<s%> on <S%H4131>him.<s%> They can't be moved.
His <S%H3820>heart<s%> is as <S%H3332>firm<s%> as a <S%H68>stone,<s%> <S%H3332>yes,<s%> firm as the <S%H8482>lower<s%> <S%H6400>millstone.<s%>
When he raises himself <S%H7613>up,<s%> the <S%H352>mighty<s%> are <S%H1481>afraid.<s%> They <S%H7667>retreat<s%> before his <S%H2398>thrashing.<s%>
If one <S%H5381>attacks<s%> him with the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> it <S%H6965>can't<s%> prevail; nor the <S%H2595>spear,<s%> the <S%H4551>dart,<s%> nor the pointed <S%H8302>shaft.<s%>
He <S%H2803>counts<s%> <S%H1270>iron<s%> as <S%H8401>straw;<s%> and <S%H5154>brass<s%> as <S%H7539>rotten<s%> <S%H6086>wood.<s%>
The <S%H1121>arrow<s%> <S%H1272>can't<s%> make him flee. <S%H68>Sling<s%> stones are <S%H2015>like<s%> chaff to <S%H7179>him.<s%>
<S%H8455>Clubs<s%> are <S%H2803>counted<s%> as <S%H7179>stubble.<s%> He <S%H7832>laughs<s%> at the <S%H7494>rushing<s%> of the <S%H3591>javelin.<s%>
His undersides are like <S%H2303>sharp<s%> <S%H2789>potsherds,<s%> <S%H7502>leaving<s%> a trail in the <S%H2916>mud<s%> like a threshing <S%H2742>sledge.<s%>
He makes the <S%H4688>deep<s%> to <S%H7570>boil<s%> like a <S%H5518>pot.<s%> He <S%H7760>makes<s%> the <S%H3220>sea<s%> like a pot of <S%H4841>ointment.<s%>
He makes a <S%H5410>path<s%> <S%H215>shine<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H2803>him.<s%> One would think the deep had white <S%H8415>hair.<s%>
On <S%H6083>earth<s%> there is not his <S%H4915>equal,<s%> that is <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H1097>without<s%> <S%H2844>fear.<s%>
He <S%H7200>sees<s%> everything that is <S%H1364>high.<s%> He is <S%H4428>king<s%> over all the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H7830>pride.<s%>"
